scripts.installer: cd ./muvr-dia && npm install && cd ../muvr-native && npm install && cd ../muvr-server && npm install && cd ./muvr-hugo && npm install && cd ../..
scripts.build-windows: cd ./muvr-server && npm run build-all && cd ../muvr-dia && npm run build-windows && npm run package && cd ../muvr-native && npm run muvr-dia-install && npm run release && cd ..
scripts.build-linux: cd ./muvr-server && npm run build-all && cd ../muvr-dia && npm run build-linux && npm run package && cd ../muvr-native && npm run muvr-dia-install && npm run release && cd ..
scripts.build-macos: cd ./muvr-server && npm run build-all && cd ../muvr-dia && npm run build-macos && npm run package && cd ../muvr-native && npm run muvr-dia-install && npm run release && cd ..
